title: IoT Attendance System with Web Server
desc: Digital attendance solution using IoT, connected to Laravel web server for real-time tracking and reporting.

title: Real-time Tobacco Oven Monitoring
desc: Flutter app for real-time monitoring and control of automated tobacco oven using IoT.

title: Smart IoT Automatic Plantation Irrigation
desc: IoT-based system for automatic irrigation, integrated with Android app for remote monitoring and control.

title: siPredi (Sistem Presensi Digital)
desc: SIPREDI is a school digital attendance app combining RFID, smart notifications, and advanced attendance reports in one integrated system. Discover a new level of effortless attendance monitoring.

title: Smart Waste Marketplace
desc: Web app to connect owners of recyclable waste with buyers, promoting circular economy.

title: Batangsaren Village Network Infrastructure
desc: Designed and implemented internet network for a village, including device installation and management.

title: Village-wide Wireless Deployment
desc: Planned and deployed wireless coverage and server room for rural community.

title: Community IT Support & CCTV
desc: Provided IT support, CCTV, and VOIP solutions for local organizations and small businesses.
